name: Grill O'Wisp
desc2: Equip to increase Rupture Agents' combat capabilities
phaseDescs: The equipper's <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>15%</ct>. When the equipper's HP decreases, their CRIT Rate increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>15%</ct> for 5s.
